title: Self-Management Capacity Enhancement Program for Patients with Knee Osteoarthritis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic anatomy and chronic disease management concepts
context.additional_context: Parallelizing theory and practice using digital devices, verifying learning outcomes through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Application of knee osteoarthritis pain management techniques to reduce pain intensity by 30% during daily activities
Establishment and execution of personalized exercise plans repeatable five or more times over six weeks
Improvement of self-management confidence by 20% using self-efficacy scales
Achieve a 15% or greater improvement in the assessment of daily living performance abilities after three months
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
